description: * 'Porcupine'* German Made* Large Wood Handle, 2-3/8' wide X 8-3/4' long* Boar/Nylon Bristle Cushion Brush

title: F.A.S.T. Hair Growth Shampoo and Conditioner Combo Pack - 12 fl. oz. each
description: Quick Hair Growth Scalp Therapy Shampoo For Men and Women is designed to supercharge your hair. Quick Hair Growth can potentially increase the rate of growth of your hair by as much as 45%.

title: Vidal Sassoon Family Pack Of 6 Combs
description: Vidal Sassoon Family 6 Pack of combs has a comb for every hair style. Comb styles include large teeth with handle, small teeth with pik handle, 2 large multi-purpose combs with fine and wide teeth, and 2 small combs with fine and wide teeth. Colors include red, green, grey, blue, and 2 black combs. Package includes 1 of each comb.
